catalog_script_client.name: Populate Address from Location

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_66b5c4681b622410d4bca977b04bcb6f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Report a Case">6086064edb41501003b3533fd3961977</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:28174c07db0d901003b3533fd396192e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate Address from Location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
        return;
    }

    /*
        var loc = g_form.getReference('location', populateReqForDetails);

        function populateReqForDetails(loc) {
            g_form.setValue('country', loc.country);
            g_form.setValue('state_province', loc.state);
            g_form.setValue('city', loc.city);
    		g_form.setValue('street', loc.street);
        }
    */

    var location = g_form.getValue('location');

    if (location) {
        g_form.setReadOnly('country', true);
        g_form.setReadOnly('state_province', true);
        g_form.setReadOnly('city', true);
        g_form.setReadOnly('street', true);

        //if (!g_form.getValue('state_province') || !g_form.getValue('city') || !g_form.getValue('country')) {
        var ga = new GlideAjax('CIRAjaxUtils');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocationData');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_location', g_form.getValue('location'));
        ga.getXML(getData);
        //}
    }

    if (!location) {
        g_form.setReadOnly('country', false);
        g_form.setReadOnly('state_province', false);
        g_form.setReadOnly('city', false);
        g_form.setReadOnly('street', false);
    }

    function getData(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        var address = JSON.parse(answer);

        if (address.country) {
            g_form.setValue('country', address.country);
        } else {
            g_form.setValue('country', '');
        }

        if (address.state) {
            g_form.setValue('state_province', address.state);
        } else {
            g_form.setValue('state_province', '');
        }

        if (address.city) {
            g_form.setValue('city', address.city);
        } else {
            g_form.setValue('city', '');
        }

        if (address.street) {
            g_form.setValue('street', address.street);
        } else {
            g_form.setValue('street', '');
        }
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-21 23:42:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>66b5c4681b622410d4bca977b04bcb6f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Address from Location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Corporate Incident Response" source="x_fru_cir">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Incident Response">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_66b5c4681b622410d4bca977b04bcb6f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-24 12:11:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
